Event Type: Provisioning platform upgrade

In an effort to continuously enhance the customer experience, we are performing routine maintenance on my.vultr.com and api.vultr.com during the following scheduled maintenance window: 

Start Time: 2023-03-27 20:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-03-27 22:00:00 UTC

This maintenance affects Vultr provisioning and management systems only. During this maintenance window deploying or managing instances via API or my.vultr.com may be unavailable for brief periods of time, but the normal operation of your Vultr instances and infrastructure will not be affected. Provisioning or management attempts during this time may timeout or fail, if so, please wait a few minutes and try again.

The 2 hour window is a precautionary measure and the work is expected to be very brief.  Please feel free to open a support ticket with any questions or concerns.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Singapore location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-03-28 16:30:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-03-28 20:30:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Singapore instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
An outage or maintenance window is affecting a subset of users in this region. Detailed outage information is available in the customer portal if this event is impacting your resources.

Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

Our Cloud Storage team is investigating a partial outage situation with our Object Storage infrastructure. The following services may be impacted by this event:

- Object Storage Subscription management
- Adding or removing buckets
- S3 client issues

We are working quickly to restore service to its optimal state.

Event Type: Software Upgrade
Start Time: 2023-03-22 00:00:00 Asia/Kolkata
End Time:   2023-03-22 04:00:00 Asia/Kolkata

We will be performing software upgrades in this location as part of an ongoing effort to maintain an ideal hosting environment. During the course of this maintenance window, your instance will be rebooted, and will be unavailable for several minutes. Please be aware that as we do not have access to your filesystem, this reboot will not be as clean as if it were done from within your OS, so preparing your software/filesystem with a graceful shutdown of services and the VPS itself would be advised.

We will be performing maintenance on the deployment infrastructure supporting our Bare Metal products on Thursday, March 21, 2023 at 14:00 UTC.

During this time re-installation, deployments, and metadata services will not be available.

Upon conclusion of the maintenance, all Bare Metal functionality will return to normal.
